author: jacopoc
msg: This is a proposal for a static release notes page that we could apply to future releases as well: it is based on the output from Jira but keeping its content as a static page has some advantages (e.g. when we will archive the release in Jira the notes will still be available).
Please review and let me know if you like it; I could also create one for the 13.07.01 release.
For now there are no links to this page because the vote to publish the 13.07.02 release is still open.
